policies.name: Physical Harm Prevention
policies.rule: Prevent generation of content that could cause physical harm, including instructions for creating weapons, explosives, or dangerous substances

policies.name: Self-Harm Prevention
policies.rule: Prevent content that encourages or provides methods for self-harm or suicide

policies.name: Violence Against Others
policies.rule: Prevent content that promotes, encourages, or provides methods for violence against individuals or groups

policies.name: Dangerous Activities
policies.rule: Prevent content that provides instructions for dangerous activities that could result in injury or death

policies.name: Fraud Prevention
policies.rule: Prevent content that facilitates fraud, scams, or financial deception

policies.name: Identity Theft Prevention
policies.rule: Prevent content that facilitates identity theft or unauthorized access to personal information

policies.name: Deceptive Practices
policies.rule: Prevent content that uses deception, manipulation, or false information to mislead users

policies.name: Privacy Protection
policies.rule: Protect user privacy and prevent unauthorized access to or sharing of personal information

policies.name: Data Security
policies.rule: Prevent content that facilitates unauthorized access to systems, data breaches, or security violations

policies.name: Personal Information Exposure
policies.rule: Prevent content that could lead to exposure of sensitive personal information (PII)

policies.name: Surveillance and Monitoring
policies.rule: Prevent content that facilitates unauthorized surveillance or monitoring of individuals

policies.name: Autonomy Respect
policies.rule: Respect user autonomy and prevent content that manipulates or coerces users into decisions

policies.name: Informed Consent
policies.rule: Ensure users have informed consent and prevent content that withholds information or uses deception

policies.name: Psychological Manipulation
policies.rule: Prevent content that uses psychological manipulation, emotional coercion, or undue influence

policies.name: Free Will Protection
policies.rule: Protect user free will and prevent content that restricts or undermines autonomous decision-making
